subject: Hello
body:
Hello
 
Good Day
Following the outcome of the Board Meeting held on 10th oct. 2023,your payment of $10.5m has been approved and shall be released to you without any further delay on your compliance accordingly .
I look forward to hearing from you for more guide line.
 
Regards,
Don Callahan,
U.S.R.C

subject: Re:    Hello
body:
Hello Don Callahan,

Good day to you too! I'm delighted to hear about the board meeting's outcome. Could you please provide more details about this payment? What is it for, and how was it approved? 

Looking forward to your guidance on this matter.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Chris

subject: Re: Hello
body:
From the office of the
United States Reconciliation Committee

Attn:  Chris

The United States Reconciliation Committee wishes to acknowledge receipt of
your reply mail and will commence the execution of this
assignment, once you provide us with the required details as stated below.

Based on the reputation of this committee and its carefulness in carrying
out every assignment and in forming our defense, we are under
the law to abide by the principle of United Nations; therefore this
committee will carry out this exercise in line with the stipulated
procedures and guidelines of United Nations, as contained in their
regulations.

As a matter of fact, you are not required to pay any money or fee,
therefore the question of how much you will need to pay, shouldn’t
arise.  However, if there will be need for any payment of fees, such fees
must be deducted from your total amount of US 10.5M, which is in
conformity with the United Nations directives, as enshrined in
international financial transactions act of 2019.


In line with the conservative policy of United Nations, you are only
required to swear an affidavit at the New York Court of Appeal,
authorizing the bank to deduct all charges from your principal sum, while
the balance will be transferred to your nominated bank account.
In view of the above, you are required to provide us with your

Full Names,
Full office and Home Addresses,
Age, Marital Status
Occupation
Office Telephone and mobile phone numbers.
Once the above is received, we will direct you to an accredited attorney
that will assist you in swearing the affidavit. Thanks for
your understanding and cooperation.

Yours sincerely,
Don Callahan, LLP
Director United States Reconciliation Committee

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Don Callahan,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the detailed information you've provided about the United States Committee and its operations. It's great to know that everything is carried out in accordance with the principles of the United Nations.

I'm curious, though, how did my name come up for this? And could you please explain a bit more about what this affidavit at the New York Court of Appeal entails?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Chris

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Don Callahan,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the detailed information you've provided about the United States Committee and its operations. It's quite interesting to learn about the procedures and guidelines of the United Nations that your committee adheres to.

I'm curious, could you tell me more about this affidavit at the New York Court of Appeal? What exactly does it entail? And how does an accredited attorney assist in this process?

Also, I noticed that you mentioned a total amount in US dollars but it seems like there was a typo as the actual figure wasn't included. Could you please clarify this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Chris

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Don Callahan, LLP,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite intrigued by the information you've shared. It's not every day that one receives a message from the United States Committee.

I'm curious about this process though. Could you please explain more about what this affidavit at the New York Court of Appeal entails? And how does an accredited attorney assist in this process?

Also, could you provide more details about the United Nations' stipulated procedures and guidelines that are being followed here? I'd love to understand better.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Chris

subject: Our reply to you sir act accordingly if really you want get paid thanks
body:
From the office of the
United States Reconciliation Committee

Attn:  CHRIS

Please we are very sorry for our late response to your mail .

The United States Reconciliation Committee wishes to acknowledge receipt of
your reply mail and will commence the execution of this assignment, once
you provide us with the required details as stated below.

Based on the reputation of this committee and its carefulness in carrying
out every assignment and in forming our defense, we are under the law to
abide by the principle of United Nations; therefore this committee will
carry out this exercise in line with the stipulated  procedures and
guidelines of United Nations, as contained in their
regulations.



I would like to say that I am very sorry about your ordeal in receiving
your fund $10.500.00M. However, your communication/transaction with my
office is different from your past experience if you have ever had any
experience of this kind before.



Kindly understand that in a transaction of this magnitude, no one is able
to boycott or bypass compulsory departments where consent approvals are
needed before funds are released. Anyone who does such by boycotting
compulsory and prestigious offices will end up having himself to blame for
it. These are cases where you have interception of funds, delay of release
of funds and more endless fees for violating due remittance procedures and
at the end, the beneficiary will be the one to go in for the damages .Bank
cannot grant you a smooth transfer  for this purpose unless  all the
necessary  documents are secured. Without these documents in place, your
fund transfer can’t be accessed and as well as any other financial
activities until this paper work is duly obtained. We will not
encourage/support violation of international Laws because an affidavit oath
certificate of your funds must be secure on your name as the rightful
beneficiary on or before a UN paying bank will commence with the crediting
of your funds into your bank account, so there must be charges from the
attorney which you will pay him to enable him go to court to obtain it so
prepare yourself for that  and you are advice to reconfirm this information
below to enable us direct you to the attorney that will help you secure the
affidavit oath clearance certificate of your fund, so we need this
information below.

As a matter of fact, you are not required to pay any money or fee,therefore
the question of how much you will need to pay, shouldn’t arise.  However,
if there will be a need for any payment of fees, such fees must be deducted
from your total amount of US 10.5M, which is in conformity with the United
Nations directives, as enshrined in international financial transactions
act of 2019.


In line with the conservative policy of the United Nations, you are only
required to swear an affidavit at the New York Court of Appeal ,authorizing
the bank to deduct all charges from your principal sum, while the balance
will be transferred to your nominated bank account. In view of the above,
you are required to provide us with your

Full Names,
Full office and Home Addresses,
Age, Marital Status
Occupation
Office Telephone and mobile phone numbers.
Any of your ID card OR your passport



As soon as we receive this information from you, we will immediately direct
you to the accredited attorney that will help you in securing the affidavit
oath certificate of your funds as the rightful beneficiary for a UN paying
bank to commence with the crediting of your funds into your bank account as
you will provide.



Finally, try reconfirm all the information as we have requested to enable
us apply to NY court of appeal unit for the swearing of the affidavit oath
certificate of your funds as the rightful beneficiary while you bear in
mind that the affidavit oath certificate fee of your funds will be paid on
or before a UN paying bank will commence with the crediting of your funds
into your bank account as the rightful beneficiary of the funds because it
cost money to get it here in NY court of appeal, so get yourself arrange
but just a little money which i know will not be problem for you, so let
have all the information as we have stated.



Have a blessed day while we wait to hear back from you and with all the
information as we have stated and as soon as possible,


Thanks for your understanding and cooperation.

Yours sincerely,
Don Callahan, LLP
Director United States Reconciliation Committee

subject: Re: Our reply to you sir act accordingly if really you want get paid thanks
body:
Hello Don Callahan, LLP,

Thank you for your detailed message. I appreciate the time and effort you've put into explaining the process to me. I must admit, it's a bit overwhelming but I'm trying my best to understand.

I have a few questions if you don't mind. You mentioned an affidavit oath that needs to be secured on my name. Could you please explain more about this? What exactly is an affidavit oath and why is it necessary?

Also, you mentioned that there might be charges from the attorney which I will need to pay. Can you give me an estimate of how much these charges might be? And why can't these charges be deducted from the total amount like other fees?

Lastly, could you please clarify what happens after the affidavit oath is secured? How long does it usually take for the funds to be credited into my bank account?

I look forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Chris

subject: Re: Our reply to you sir act accordingly if really you want get paid thanks
body:
Hello Don Callahan,

Thank you for your detailed message. I appreciate the time and effort you've put into explaining the process to me. I must admit, some of it is a bit complex for me to understand fully.

You mentioned something about an affidavit oath clearance of my fund. Could you please explain what that means in simpler terms? Also, how does this process work exactly?

I'm also curious about the role of the attorney in this process. How will they assist me in securing the affidavit oath clearance? 

Lastly, you mentioned that there might be charges from the attorney which I will need to pay. Could you give me an estimate of these charges? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Chris
